description:
The story centers on a woman who is getting on in years, but all her cats think she`s a man so they call her http://anidb.net/ch115683 [Ojii-chan]. One day a brazen cat named http://anidb.net/ch115684 [Tsushima] appears in Ojii-chan`s yard.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description: Ojiichan(woman) who likes cats meets the talking(?) cat Tsushima on the street. Tsushima gets tempted by food and starts living in Ojiichan’s house; Tsushima’s new life has begun!
Who gave the name “Tsushima” to the cat? This is a story from when Tsushima was given the name “Tsushima.” The vagabond Tsushima’s past is getting revealed?!

Ojii-chan tries to please Tsushima with food, brush, and toys.. Will Tsushima stay at Ojiichan’s house?
Source: official youtube channel
Ojiichan thinks Tsushima is so adorable, but she takes Tsushima “somewhere”… Tsushima becomes upset because of that and decides to leave the house?! Will his life with Ojiichan end like this…?
Tsushima`s taking a nap. Then he suddenly hears Ojiichan`s scream that interrupts the sweet nap! After hearing that, Tsushima...?! There`s a scary intruder in the room!!
Chaa is one of the cats living with Ojiichan. Ojiichan is occupied with Chaa and Tsushima is not happy about it. On the other hand, easy going Chaa goes out somewhere again today.
The neighborhood cats come to Ojiichan`s house. One of them, Osamu, who is aggressive came to visit. Tsushima is cautious about him. In the meantime, Ojiichan decides to leave the house, and...?
The topic of cat meetings is often about food. Today, Tsushima feels like some brushing? Toys? Or...? In the meantime, Ojiichan feels something is physically wrong!?
What is precious to Ojiicha? Tsushima decides to go out to collect "something special" for Ojiichan. In the meantime, Ojiichan reunited with "the cat" she has a special memories with.
The topic of cat meetings is often about food. Today, Tsushima feels like some brushing? Toys? Or...? In the meantime, Ojiichan feels something is physically wrong!?

Something unexpected happened to Tsushima! A doctor`s housr visit didn`t make difference, so they decided to go to the hospital... Tsushima, who was betrayed by Ojiichan and closed off his heart, finally decides to...
Ojiichan is worried and looks everywhere for Tsushima, who ran away from home, but not able to find him. Where did Tsushima go?

SPECIAL.description: Tsushima looks out of the window at Ojiichan`s house. A peaceful morning with scarecrows, sparrows and radio calisthenics as usual.
Ojiichan often watches a play on TV. Tsushima think about why he does, but has no idea about it.
Osamu has not gotten used to Ojiichan yet. Tsushima faces his back towards the two. What is on his mind?
Tsushima is patiently waiting and drooling right in front of his favorite fish, Mackerel. Tsushima approaches struggling Ojiichan and...
There are other cats living in Ojiichan`s house besides Tsushima. A capricious male cat Chaa seems like he has houses in various places.
Life is full of surprises. Cowardly Chaa seems like he`s surprised at something...
A gangster cat Osuamu comes to Ojiichan`s house, however he doesn`t get used to Ojiichan yet.
A sitter who came to take care of Tsushima and the cats. Everybody loves her and Ojiichan gets a little jealous of her?
Sister Zun who lives in Ojiichan`s house is an amazing sister of Tsushima and the other cats.
What`s Zun`s "Kuin" that shocked Tsushima when he first came to Ojiichan`s house..?
Ojiichan stumbled on something in the dark. What is that round silhouette!?
Ojiichan tries to eat Tsushima`s hand. He was unpleasant by Ojiichan`s behavior, he accidentally pushed her away.
Seeing Ojiichan goes to sleep right after eating, Tsushima...?
Ojiichan often wakes up in the middle of the night and seems to battle her temptation for late night snack.
Seeing Ojiichan lifting up Osamu, the Sitter starts to think...
Tsushima, who is breathing heavily, hisses at Osamu for coming to Ojiichan`s house to be fed.
Ojiichan tries to turn the AC down because it is too hot. She reaches for the remote but...?
While Ojiichan is walking outside, she finds a cicada being still on the ground.
Tsushima came to a fish market where Ojiichan works. Today`s special is a rockfish!

titles.title: お店やさんごっこ. ①

SPECIAL.description: Next, Tsushima came to a Soba restaurant Ojiichan works. Of course he pays for food with...?

titles.title: お店やさんごっこ. ②

SPECIAL.description: It is time for the potatos Ojiichan carefully nourished to be harvested!
Ojiichan`s next home gardening obsession is eggplant! Early to bed and early to rise, taking care of it, and...
While Ojiichan is taking a nap, she notices the buzz of cicada today was way too loud...
Ojiichan reacts to Tsushima trying to get a goodnight kiss before bed...
Ojiichan sighed looking at the pile of laundry. She needs a hand, even a hand of Tsushima...
Cats have a daily routine. What is Tsushima`s...?
Chaa wakes up and finds Ojiichan in pain! Chaa decides to help Ojiichan!
When Ojiichan woke up, she had a hoarse voice. Ojiichan stars to share what she was dreaming.
Ojiichan cries for Tsushima`s help when a cockroach came in from the window.
Ojiichan is exhausted by the humid heat. She asks Tsushima to blow the wind and...
A sphinx is known for riddles! Tushima dressed up as a sphinx gives one to Ojiichan.
A cockroach suddenly appears and surprises Ojiichan. Ojiichan asks Tsushima for help but Tsushima refuses, and...
Zun is the most important individual in Ojiichan`s house! She is the number one priority.
Zun loves inside the futon. She couldn`t be happier if she had Ojiichan`s leg pillow!
Zun also likes Kotatsu. Ojiichan tries to walk and makes sure not to step onto her, but...
Ojiichan picks up something on the back of Chaa, something that crows are scared of and...
There are many creatures everywhere around Ojiichan and the cats. Insects are on the leaves of eggplants or doorknobs...
Once upon a time, Chaa had been called a different name by Ojiichan. What was the story behind the name "Chaa"?
Chaa always look so relaxed, but actually he is very cautious! He`s watching out while eating.
Osamu patiently waiting behind Chaa. When Chaa notice that, he freezes and...
Ojiichan is scratched by Tsushima and other cats and with bandages all over her body because of that. The neighbors saw that and...
When Ojiichan is not home, Sitter comes to take care of Tsushima and other cats. Here is her introduction!
Sitter came to Ojiichan even she is home today. The two of them started to fight over Tsushima and...
Seeing Ojiichan hold Tsushima, Sitter tries to hold Osamu.
Tsushima likes the toys now, but he used to refuse to play around the time he came. Osamu also was scared of the toys and...
Ojiichan is cleaning her ears because they were so itchy.  Ojiichan`s ear cleaning got Tsushima and Osamu speechless...
Zun is always sleeping under the kotatsu, but back in the day, she went far away worrying about Ojiichan and looked for her.
Ojiichan is freezing even in the kotastu, so she calls for Tsushima to keep her warm and...
There is a dog named Pes, who lives near the gathering spot where Tsushima stops by. Pes asks Tsushima to demonstrate how to climb a tree.
Pes, who looks up to Tsushima as his brother, decides to welcome Tsushima to teach him about insects.
Ojiichan takes out the laundry after a spin dry and screams as she finds something.
Ojiichan and Tsushima made a grave for Yamotan who passed suddenly. After coming home, Tsushima stares at one spot and...
Chaa and Osamu are facing each other while eating. Tsushima and Ojiichan watch them eat but...
Chaa comes in between Ojiichan and Tsushima to interrupt Ojiichan brushing. But there is someone who watch the two cats and...?
Seeing Tsushima, Osamu is no longer able to resist himself and put his face onto the brush.
A member from the cat meeting, Tsukinowa, asks Tsushima to play. However, Tsushima doesn`t feel like playing.
Pes and Tsukinowa observe Tsushima on the wall, being face to face with a stray cat. Pes is impressed by how Tsushima stays so calm.
While everyone is asleep, thunder echos. It looks like Osamu got scared by that and...
In rain, Chaa came home soaking wet. He gets a towel dry by Ojiichan but goes outside again right away.
Tsushima get jealous of Chaa getting a towel dry, so he decided to join in. Osamu gets jealous by watching them as well.
While Ojiichan takes a nap under the kotatsu, Osamu and Tsushima runs over her and...
Ojiichan takes out the garbage accumulated during the holidays. Tsushima grabs Ojiichan`s leg to show he wants her to take more rest.
Azure winged magpie is very cautious. They start to threaten Tsushima for walking towards them.
Tsushima rubs his face onto the sliding door and show where his territories are. Seeing that, Chaa decides to take action to show where his territory is.
Tsushima notices Osamu coming towards him. The two stare at each other in the eyes and...?
What`s the reason for reconciliation between Tsushima and Osamu? That`s happened when they were looking at the window of a house.

There are different drinking fountains for each cats.
Today, we will introduce you to some of them!
Seeing Chaa and Osamu "cat loaf", Ojiichan decides to try that too. What can you see from a point of a cat?

titles.title: Neko wa Naze Koubako o Tsukuru no ka.
猫はなぜ香箱を作るのか.

SPECIAL.description: Osamu approaches Ojiichan with a flirty face, but suddenly slaps Ojiichan in her face!
Chaa approaches Ojiichan in her sleep. Chaa suddenly screams.
Cats look fat but actually they are really thin! Tsushima also looks chubby but it`s just his winter hair is long?
Ojiichan was supposed to be sleeping next to Tsushima, however she is not breathing! What happen to her!?
Ojiichan came back to life in the end. Tsushima apologizes to Ojiichan but...
Chaa gets threatened by a bird but is in trouble. However, he seems to be moving forward slowly and...
Osamu runs and wakes up everyone while they are sleeping.  What is thee reason?
Osamu hears someone talking to Chaa, and runs towards the direction!
Tsushima observes Ojiichan eating. Ojiichan tells him not to eat, but...
After a meal, Ojiichan  buries her face into Tsushima`s tummy and takes a deep breath. It is a moment of happiness.
Cats spend hald a day grooming. Appearance is important!
Ojiichan decided to clean the terrace. Why has she kept the piles of fallen leaves for a while?
Ojiichan started cleaning again, with a new weapon. Chaa comes to the scene and...
Chaa brings something to gift Ojichan, but she refuses. Chaa leaves sadly, however...
Ojiichan decided to exercise worrying about being too lazy all the time. It`s time for a radio calisthenics that Ojiichan barely remembers!
Ojiichan has a strained back. There is a shadow targeting the poor Ojiichan...
It is not good to stay still,  so let`s exercise with Tsushima!
Ojiichan approaches Osamu with a spoiled Tsushima riding her. However, Osamu was surprised by how they looked and...
Everyone is getting along well everyday. See ya later, until then!
